snippet: At the Netroots Nation conference in Rhode Island, attendees considered how their candidates would deal with campaign attack ads fueled by “super PACs.”
abstract: Reporter's Notebook; liberal activists and bloggers gathering at the Netroots Nation conference in Providence, RI, express anxiety that their highly organized ground operations will be no match for outsized spending on campaign attack ads by Republican super PACs in the 2012 elections.
lead_paragraph: At the Netroots Nation conference in Rhode Island, attendees considered how their candidates would deal with campaign attack ads fueled by “super PACs.”

headline.seo: At Netroots Nation Meeting, Talk of ‘super PACs’
headline.main: At Meeting of Left’s Online Activists, Weighing Impact of Attack Ads
headline.print_headline: At Meeting of Left’s Online Activists, Weighing Impact of Attack Ads
